price: 26 Les impies se disent entre eux : « N’écoutez pas le Coran ! Perturbez au contraire sa lecture afin de prendre le dessus ! »
arabic: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لَا تَسۡمَعُواْ لِهَٰذَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانِ وَٱلۡغَوۡاْ فِيهِ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَغۡلِبُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: waqāla alladhīna kafarū lā tasmaʿū lihādhā al-qur'āni wal-ghaw fīhi laʿallakum taghlibūna
